headline: Liu Wen Shines For Chopard In Cannes: Look Of The Day
short descr: WHERE: The Chopard "Mystery Party" at the Cannes Film Festival on May 21st. WHAT: The Victoria's Secret Angel looked stunning
image_caption(s): Kore by Sophia Kokosalaki Ruched One Shoulder Dress, $209
article: WHO: Supermodel Liu Wen WHAT: The Victoria's Secret Angel looked stunning in a grecian-style Roberto Cavalli gown, which she paired with drop earrings, a diamond bracelet and black woven clutch. The deep teal hue of the dress complemented Liu's glowing complexion and dark hair perfectly. WHERE: The Chopard "Mystery Party" at the Cannes Film Festival on May 21st.  Getty ImagesShop a similar look below and check out more of our Look Of The Day picks.Want more? Be sure to check out Stylelist on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr and Pinterest.

headline: 7 Incredible Outdoor Spas (PHOTOS)
short descr: Vitamin D does wonders for our health.
image_caption(s): Grand Solmar Land's End Resort & Spa -- Los Cabos, Mexico
article: Vitamin D does wonders for our health. Better known as the "sunshine vitamin" because our bodies produce it from the sun's rays, Vitamin D regulates blood pressure, reduces muscle tension, and prevents cancer and various other diseases. Luckily for us, some of our favorite spa hotels offer just the the right treatments for those looking to bask in the sun's rays. Whether the resorts boast ocean-side cabanas or secluded rooftop hot tubs, these outdoor spas really know how to make us feel good -- all while we're soaking up the sun, of course.-- Devon Antonetti, Oyster.com
